entry.summary: Re SBF: 1) I still do not have access to much of my data -- professional or personal. So there is a limit to what I will be able to say, and I won't be as helpful as I'd like. But as the committee still thinks it would be useful, I am willing to testify on the 13th. https://twitter.com/RepMaxineWaters/status/1599858166359068676

entry.title: .@renprotocol plans to wind down 1.0 version and calls for holders of Ren assets to bridge back to native chains ASAP.
entry.summary: .@renprotocol plans to wind down 1.0 version and calls for holders of Ren assets to bridge back to native chains ASAP. Ren: 1) Important notice ⚠️ As announced previously, the Ren 1.0 network is shutting down due to the events surrounding Alameda As compatibility between Ren 1.0 and 2.0 cannot be guaranteed, holders of Ren assets should bridge back to native chains ASAP, or risk losing them! https://twitter.com/renprotocol/status/1594305211115663360

entry.title: Senate Banking Committee orders SBF to testify in-person at Dec. 13th hearing, with a subpoena “on the table.”
entry.summary: Senate Banking Committee orders SBF to testify in-person at Dec. 13th hearing, with a subpoena “on the table.” Maxine Waters: Lies are circulating @CNBC that I am not willing to subpoena @SBF_FTX. He has been requested to testify at the December 13th hearing. A subpoena is definitely on the table. Stay tuned.

entry.title: Rep. @RitchieTorres requests an investigation into the SEC’s “failure to protect the investing public from the egregious mismanagement and malfeasan...
entry.summary: Rep. @RitchieTorres requests an investigation into the SEC’s “failure to protect the investing public from the egregious mismanagement and malfeasance of FTX,” calling Gary Gensler “singularly responsible for the regulatory failures.”
